mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based automated data pipeline platform founded in 2012, offering automated ETL/ELT processes.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-native automated data pipeline platform handling schema drift, incremental updates, and monitoring out-of-the-box. Hands-off ingestion layer allowing engineers to focus on transformation rather than connector maintenance. Major disruptor to traditional ETL.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Cloud-based automated data extraction and loading for complex data pipelines with flexibility for ETL/ELT strategies based on business needs.

mentionedBy.name: Informatica
mentionedBy.notes: Handles schema drift, incremental updates, and pipeline monitoring out-of-the-box. Allows data engineers to focus on transformation and analytics rather than connector maintenance. Hands-off, cloud-native ingestion layer for organizations burdened by complex on-prem connectors.
